text:
@piersmorgan Download the Giftping app from your App Store or from https://t.co/4GAhPx3liC

Send instant e-gift cards while in lockdown with a personalised message and remember we’re giving away our full charge to the NHS Covid-19 appeal until further notice.

domain.name: Product
domain.description: Products created by Brands.  Examples: Ford Explorer, Apple iPhone.

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Entertainment Personality
domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings
